documents.titre: Box of Chocolate Candy - Cherry medium
documents.description: Indulge your sweet tooth with our box of chocolate candy. Choose from a variety of flavors including zesty orange and sweet cherry. Each box contains an assortment of rich, flavorful chocolates with a smooth, creamy filling
